page.title: 03 PARK FARM,STOKE BRUERNE.
page.content:
PARK FARM HAS A TOTAL AREA OF ABOUT 181 ACRES.THIS IS WHAT IS BEING PLANTED IN 1985......
2 WHEAT FIELDS ( 50 ACRES) 1 BARLEY FIELD ( 6 ACRES) 1 FODER BEET FIELD ( 3 ACRES) 1 HAY FIELD ( 15 ACRES) 3 FIELDS OF FIELD BEANS ( 31 ACRES). THERE ARE ALSO 7 FIELDS WITH A TOTAL OF 75 ACRES OF GRASS AND WOODLANDS. THEY HAVE NO SHEEP,BUT 45 BULLOCKS, 2 PIGS,7 COWS FOR CALF REARING,15 CALVES AND 150 CHICKENS. ON THE FARM THEY HAVE 1 POND WITH GOLDFISH IN.ALSO THEY HAVE 4 GUN DOGS AND 9 CATS TO CATCH MICE. MOST OF THE FARM BUILDINGS WERE BUILT IN 1900 SO WAS THE HOUSE. THE DOVECOTE WAS BUILT IN 1665. ( BY LISA HOLDEN AGE 10 )
